tweet:
Remember today is #SmallBusinessSaturday so don’t forget to #ShopSmall!

We have many great locally owned small businesses here in #NY16, and when you shop local the money often stays in the community.

On this day of giving thanks, I want to take a moment to share my deep appreciation for the wonderful community we all share here in #NY16. It truly is a special place filled with amazing people. I am honored & grateful to represent it. 

Have a very #HappyThanksgiving!

Proud to lead the New York delegation with @RepGraceMeng & @NydiaVelazquez in demanding details from @NYCHA on the steps they’re taking to adequately provide heat to residents this winter. https://twitter.com/RepGraceMeng/status/1199398219949772808 …

Early in 2019, I railed against big money in politics by advocating for the protection of small donors & fusion voting (see below). This new, misguided Public Financing Commission plan fails to protect grassroots groups like @NYWFP. We need them.
 https://wskg.org/news/ny-public-finance-commission-plan-condemned-by-states-minor-political-parties/ … pic.twitter.com/5kQbqdiMn8

Yet another stark reminder that the nations of the world need to step up, not step back.  

And #Trump’s decision to withdraw from the #ParisClimateAccord is an international disgrace. https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2019/11/26/bleak-report-un-says-drastic-action-is-only-way-avoid-worst-impacts-climate-change/ …

We know a lot more now, but @SecPompeo continues to ignore a duly authorized subpoena. 

What else is he hiding? 

Why is he covering for the President instead of standing up for American diplomats and our national security?

Less than a month later, she was recalled for no good reason. 

That’s why @HouseForeign began looking into this situation and Giuliani’s involvement. https://twitter.com/houseforeign/status/1125768235821957123?s=21 …

Here’s the letter @LeaderHoyer and I sent to @SecPompeo in April. 

We were puzzled by why the @StateDept let the attacks on Yovanovitch go unanswered.  https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/_cache/files/6/e/6e135623-f3fa-4889-8eb7-c23610a36183/F0A46A066EE71DE1559C41BBDC5C3702.04-12-19-letter-from-ele-hoyer-to-pompeo-on-ambassador-yovanovitch.pdf …

Hindsight is 20/20. Now that we know more facts—incl that @SecPompeo & Giuliani were in contact—it’s clear why Pompeo was silent when Amb. Yovanovitch was being smeared: Pompeo was assisting in the scheme to pressure Ukraine to help Trump politically.  https://nyti.ms/34fhheu

Yes, Stephen Miller needs to go. He never should have been in the White House to begin with. https://www.salon.com/2019/11/21/more-than-100-democrats-in-congress-sign-letter-calling-for-trump-to-fire-stephen-miller/ …
Thank you for the kind words! As Chair of @Houseforeign my commitment to the Americas & Latino causes in the US is unwavering. https://twitter.com/lecumberry/status/1197862123667382273 …

I met today with constituents from @actfl to discuss the importance of promoting foreign languages in our #publicschools. Learning another language is a key skill in our ever globalizing society. I proudly voted for increased funding to promote these programs earlier this year. pic.twitter.com/3RImAJ939y
Proud to stand with @RepShalala in supporting #Nicaraguans fleeing oppression. https://twitter.com/RepShalala/status/1197589712967471105 …

Today is #WorldPancreaticCancerDay, a day that is very personal to me. 

We have made some amazing strides in the fight against #PancreaticCancer in recent years and we must continue to robustly fund our @NIH to build on that progress. #WageHope #WPCD @PanCAN pic.twitter.com/UYQ7YpL22c

The sad reality is that many people still face harassment, discrimination, and violence just because of who they are. 

It is ugly, it is wrong, and it is why we must always recognize #TransDayofRemembrance. https://engel.house.gov/latest-news/engel-statement-on-transgender-day-of-remembrance/ …

Today’s #ImpeachmentHearing made clear that Trump used his office to pressure a foreign govt to interfere in our election for his own personal benefit. That should outrage every American—no President should be able to put himself before our country’s interests. https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1194637580396122112 …

Last week, I led 16 members of Congress in strongly urging President Trump to cancel the meeting with President Erdogan. https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/2019/11/engel-leads-bipartisan-effort-urging-trump-to-rescind-white-house-invitation-to-turkey-s-erdogan …

Trump’s meeting with Erdogan let Turkey off the hook for invading Syria, causing a mass exodus of Kurds, and purchasing the S-400 missile system from Russia. This meeting was a mistake from start to finish. It should never have happened. https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/2019/11/engel-statement-on-trump-erdogan-meeting …

Busy day in DC with the #ImpeachmentInquiry but we can’t forget our #DREAMers. Yesterday I spoke on the House Floor to defend the #DACA program as #SCOTUS begins hearing oral arguments on it. pic.twitter.com/gg2N5FwuHJ

A vote for the ERA is a vote for equality. Those who oppose the ERA are preserving the legacy of sex discrimination. I'm proud to support @RepSpeier's bill & @HouseJudiciary's historic markup so that our Constitution better achieves the eternal promise of equal justice under law!
SOON: I’ll join ⁦@wolfblitzer⁩ on ⁦@CNN⁩ to discuss the start of open hearings in the #ImpeachmentInquiry. pic.twitter.com/0ixDhLp8cs

Decisive action must be taken on gun violence prevention. No more excuses. I am happy to hear that @AMarch4OurLives will support the Engel-@RepJayapal Safe Gun Storage Act. Gun violence and gun suicides are preventable, and clearly the next generation of leaders understand this.

BTW, I have introduced #HR2670 to ban the horrific weapon used in the #FortHood shooting, the  Five-seveN pistol and its variants. 

There is no reason people should have access to this firearm. 

None.

Today marks the 2 year anniversary of the #SutherlandSpring shooting in Texas AND the 10 year anniversary of the #FortHood shooting. 

You would think over the last year, 2 years, or even 10 years the #GOP would be willing to #dosomething about #gunviolence. But they have not.

It has been 306 days into the 116th Congress and @HouseDemocrats have passed over 200 bills #ForThePeople. 

We have taken decisive action to move our country forward, including passing #HR8 to expand #backgroundchecks. 

But @senatemajldr has done nothing.

I quickly ushered #HR9 the Climate Action Now Act through @houseforeign earlier this year to prevent exactly this. 

The House passed it. 

But Trump and the @SenateGOP would rather watch the world burn, literally. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1191458401987039234 …
